data.text: @MarkedByCovid @MindyForMA @ewarren @repblais We're saying the politicians are virtue signaling when they tout this bill to remember the people they were partly responsible for killing. We've long called for a Wall of Remembrance to be put up in Washington, DC for all the fallen.
@MindyForMA @ewarren @repblais The greatest day of your miserable life because you can cover that mug with a mask for two years

@CO_COVIDWATCH @MindyForMA @ewarren @repblais It's nowhere close to enough, but it's not completely moot.

We're 100% with you in fighting for more... everything. But calling this bit of progress "virtue signaling" undermines the work of thousands who have lost loved ones and discourages others from co-sponsoring.

@MarkedByCovid @MindyForMA @ewarren @repblais We're not criticizing you, we're criticizing the politicians who have sat on their hands for 2 years instead of putting measures in place PROVEN to slow the spread. Remembrances are really important, but when these same politicians aren't doing anything else, it's moot.

@ErstwhileIII @MindyForMA @ewarren @repblais Are they not included in this? Have we not also advocated for a huge range of mitigation, recovery, accountability, and prevention efforts, including fighting disinformation?

@CO_COVIDWATCH @MindyForMA @ewarren @repblais Tens of thousands of people who have lost loved ones to COVID have spent countless hours advocating for this legislation… as well as other solutions to hold decision-makers accountable & mitigate disaster impact in the short AND long term.

We’re on the same side here.

@MindyForMA @MarkedByCovid @ewarren @repblais What about all the people that we lost that we should not have lost (due to much disinformation by Republicans and the fanning of the "don't tell me what to do" crowd that also helped/helps spread Covid 19?

@MindyForMA @ewarren @repblais Will this include all those who died by suicide during covid, died from the VAERS, died from drug overdoses due to covid lockdowns? This suggests the pandemic is over but you remind us every day it is not.
@MindyForMA @MarkedByCovid @ewarren @repblais Enough virtue signaling and actually do something about the ongoing pandemic, how about?
